name: Magical Cunning
trigger: when you perform a 1-minute esoteric rite
effects: at the end of the rite, you regain expended Pact Magic spell slots up to a number equal to half your maximum (round up)
limits: once you use this feature, you cannot use it again until you finish a long rest
